And the reason I state that she is very much tempting the male teacher into having sex. Take this into consideration; if both parties are virgins as stated, then how do they come to hsve sex and deflower? Someone has to have the confidence enough to put in moves and approach the other person. This is especially prevalent in certain parts of Japanese society, wherein there are couples who even get married but lack confidence to a point of barely exchanging words or touching each other. In my opinion, actions taken by the characters in this Manga make sense and do not fail at being realistic in portraying the instant formation of couple.

@q9za a girl can be a horny nympho without being a casual sex having slut that sleeps around; a girl can be horny and want to fuck the shit out of her boyfriend whom she is dating, regardless of naive or not, experienced or not whatever, virginity has no bearing on this. the issue i was actually talking about with this and most other defloration doujins, is that theyre not written as defloration doujins, but the writing is HEAVILY forced around making the girl a virgin just because. look up what "virgin" means, it means that she hasnt had sex before. however, in the doujin, we see her having casual sex with a guy she exchanged 7 words with and hasnt been on a single date out on with together. so think about this: why would a girl who is willing to fuck with guys whom she doesnt date or have any relationship with be a virgin? a girl which is open to having sex with anyone and enjoys having sex anywhere, anytime, with whomever will, obviously, have sex, so by definition not be a virgin.

By which I mean, I would love, and so would everyone else, to have a trad naive inexperienced virgin be absolutely horny over you and want to fuck the shit out of you. Unfortunately, this does not exist and we must use manga as the medium to fulfill this nonexistant dream.
